PluginData.Author: Adriano
PluginData.Tooltip: Adds an App to LCD screens that works like regular button pads but on LCDs.
PluginData.Description:
This mod adds an App to LCD screens that works like regular button pads but on LCDs, you can assign some terminal actions to buttons. The amount of available button depends on the screen size but can be configured using "Ctrl + Shift + Mouse Scroll Wheel".
Note: To prevent the window popup when you click you can use you middle click or have a tool like a welder equipped.
